name: DTO Pattern
desc: Pattern for creating Data Transfer Objects

rules.location: MUST be in Application.Contracts, NEVER in Domain
rules.records: Can use records for immutable DTOs

listRequestDto.name: {EntityName}ListRequestDto
listRequestDto.desc: DTO for list requests with paging and sorting

example.snippet: public class SystemLogDto { public Guid Id { get; set; } public string Message { get; set; } public SystemLogLevel LogLevel { get; set; } public string ApplicationName { get; set; } public DateTime CreationTime { get; set; } // ... other properties }
